tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: yes, friendly, and explains the issue very well. clearly explaining the  treatment procedure, effect and result. explaining the medication very well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had spine surgery done in another hospital outside tamilnadu, where they did a mistake to me in operation.  Due to that mistake, after 5 months of surgery I got CSF leakage in my suture line. Then I visited Dr. S.S KUMAR in Astra Spine Center in Velachery and Semmencheri nookaplyam link road, searched through YouTube, Doctor examined and given proper explanation and his treatment was good to me. I got admitted in hospital for 7 days, all the staffs were good in communicating things and immediate responses were given to me. Good nursing care. Good management systems. Duty doctors also have utmost care towards me and great concern. The Food provided by Hospital is soo good and its like homely food , Well maintained hospital ,It's best Spine and Ortho hospital in chennai with best reasonable cost. I do recommend this hospital for my family and friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor appears to diagnose the core issue quickly. In my case I had pins and needles / tingling in hands and doctor suspected this to be ulnar nerve entrapment. However while surgery is the only option to release, DR Kumar did not opt for this as other tests showed inconclusive result. While I am still awaiting the relief I respect the doctors decision in not wanting to do surgery unless there is a conclusive evidence.  This is the approach a doctor must have.  Would recommend this doctor to anyone.

tags: Wait time,
review: The doctor was not available both the time we visited the hospital. The hospital is far from my home yet we were made to wait for more than 4 hours, the second time when we visited the doctor was not even in the hospital nor was he going to visit the hospital. No one from the hospital nor the doctor informed us about this. Very bad experience - we spent around 1000 rs just for travel But then we still couldn’t see the doctor. Highly disappointed and will never visit this hospital or the doctor ever again. My sincere advice to others is please don’t visit this hospital,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
* ****** *** **** ****** ** ******** ** ***** *****.
When i searched about the best doctors i read everyone's review. Then we found Dr S S Kumar.

When i booked the appointment right the follow-up to appointment till I met the doctor, hospital staffs were guiding us properly. Staffs were very friendly and cooperative.

Then I met Dr S S Kumar, he was patiently listening all our problem to diagnose the root cause. Once I finished telling about our problems then he asked us to do X-Ray. 

After the X-Ray, he found the root cause. Most of the doctors asked us to do surgery. But Dr S S Kumar was the only one to tell us it can be cured without surgery and he diagnosed the problem.

I followed up his treatments and visited him for reviews. Gradually i could see the difference in the pain and comfort. I could say I'm cured without any surgery.

When others asked for surgery, he diagnosed the cause and cured me without surgery which is a huge relief for patients.

Thank you Dr S S Kumar and team for the wonderful experience by giving proper treatment and service.

I highly recommend everyone to consult him for all your Ortho problems.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dear practo, pls correct the consultation fee from Rs. 400 to Rs. 3200. pls find the break up below,new patients compulsory xray to be done(even if you have the MRI report and film with you), Rs. 700.blood test to see any vitamin deficiency, Rs. 2100.Finally, Dr. Kumar consultation fee, Rs. 400** * *** **** ********** ** ******* ***** * ***** **** ******* *** ***** *********
Friendly and detailed diagnosis with assurances of getting better with correct physiotherapy and exercises.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I recently had an excellent experience at kumar doctor. The staff was very attentive compassionate and professional and they went above and beyond to ensure that i received the best treatment. The infrastructure was neat and clean and all the necessary equipment and facilities to provide top notch. I had neck pain  almost 1 year I consul near by clinic not yet cure recently . After I consult kumar sir he explained about the issue detailed.. And gave some physiotherapy for three days. And 1 week pain killer and some excercise.. Now I feel better.. Thanks for the treatment and your support doctor.
Doctor gave patient hearing to the issues & made appropriate suggestions. Will definitely recommend
First Impression is the lasting experience. Ambiance good.  Doctor conversation with patient and explanation wad good.
Good . Excellent care given by staff and was good in consulting . Best consultation and care .thank you
Immediate diagnosis of the issue . Very friendly and clear explanation of the issue ..... Highly recommended
Very warm and humble doctor with cost effective, recommend the pre,during and post treatment taken cares
Doctor did not even check the severity of pain by putting pressure or other trechniques. Was straight away taken for X Ray and then to physiotherapist..
reply_text:
Dear Patient,

Please note that, Doctor doesn't always fully examine the patient when they are suffering from pain as it will aggregate the pain during the examination, which is why pain killers are precised first. 

As the pain subsides, The final diagnosis is usually made after examination during the second free visit. As it is required in some patients who are in pain during the first visit.

If you have any queries, kindly contact the hospital number.

review: Doctor is well experienced and he explained the issues very clearly. Even the staff are also very cooperative.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I went for cervical side muscle strain. He patiencely listened and consulting back with polite response. Seems to be resonable fare too.

**** ********* didn’t have patience to listen to hear the case history and pushed me to take X ray. After seeing the X ray, he said bone degeneration. Take pain killers & muscle relaxant for a few days , if doesn’t settle then we’ll go for MRI Scan. Totally he spend less than 3  minutes together & came to a conclusion. ** ****** ******** *********** *****
reply_text:
Dear Patient,
In an outpatient clinic, Doctors don't always have time to know entire history as an in patient. If you felt you had relevant ok history, you should have 
informed at that time.
Please note that, Doctor doesn't always fully examine the patient when they are suffering from pain as it will aggregate the pain during the examination, which is why pain killers are prescripted first. 

As the pain subsides, The final diagnosis is usually made after examination during the second free visit. As it is required in some patients who are in pain during the first visit.

Please note that you haven't visited for the review nor informed us your concern on the same. 

It is disheartening to see such comments against a doctor without undergoing his treatment.

If you have any queries, kindly contact the hospital number.
